title: Lesson Study (LS)-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Elementary Mental Arithmetic Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic educational methodologies and mathematics curriculum content
context.additional_context: An educational program where pre-service teachers analyze elementary students' mental arithmetic learning processes and improve interaction strategies through lesson study.

learning_goals: Ability to design step-by-step improvement plans for mental arithmetic instruction applying the Lesson Study (LS) cycle
Ability to critically analyze and revise pre-service teachers' interaction strategies based on learner responses
Ability to develop customized instructional strategies utilizing uncertainty management and pedagogical heterogeneity theory
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
